title: Families get angry
creator_credit: Oxford Films (U.S.), John Simons and Delton Cook
brief_description: A family quarrel begins when the father in a black, low-income family is trying to stretch too little money to pay too many bills. The two children are strongly affected by their parents’ conflict.
